Field Label: Record ID

PCL-C

INSTRUCTIONS: Below is a list of problems and complaints that people sometimes have in response to stressful life experiences. Please read each one carefully then select one choice to indicate how much you have been bothered by that problem in the past month.
Repeated, disturbing memories, thoughts, or images of a stressful experience from the past?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Repeated, disturbing dreams of a stressful experience from the past?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Suddenly acting or feeling as if a stressful experience were happening again (as if you were reliving it)?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Feeling very upset when something reminded you of a stressful experience from the past?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Having physical reactions (e.g., heart pounding, trouble breathing, sweating) when something reminded you of a stressful experience from the past?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Avoiding thinking about or talking about a stressful experience from the past or avoiding having feelings related to it?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Avoiding activities or situations because they reminded you of a stressful experience from the past?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Trouble remembering important parts of a stressful experience from the past?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Loss of interest in activities that you used to enjoy?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Feeling distant or cut off from other people?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Feeling emotionally numb or being unable to have loving feelings for those close to you?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Feeling as if your future will somehow be cut short?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Trouble falling or staying asleep?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Feeling irritable or having angry outbursts?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Having difficulty concentrating?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label: Being "super-alert" or watchful or on guard?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 1- not at all | 2, 2- A little bit | 3, 3- Moderately | 4, 4- Quite a bit | 5, 5- Extremely

Field Label:
Scoring:

Scoring instructions are adapted from the handout "Using the PTSD Checklist for DSM-IV (PCL)" available from the National Center for PTSD at www.ptsd.va.gov.

A total symptom severity score (range = 17-85) can be obtained by summing the scores from each of the 17 items that have response options ranging from 1 "Not at all" to 5 "Extremely."

A provisional diagnosis can be established in three ways:

1) Determine whether an individual meets DSM-IV symptom criteria as defined by at least 1 B item (questions 1-5), 3 C items (questions 6-12), and at least 2 D items (questions 13-17). Symptoms that are rated as "Moderately" or above (responses 3 through 5 on individual items) are counted as present.

2) Determine whether the total severity score exceeds a relevant normative threshold (e.g., for primary care settings).

3) Combine methods (1) and (2) to ensure that an individual meets both the symptom pattern and severity threshold.
